title: Portrait of Professor Karl E. Weston, Class of 1896
inscriptions: l.c. typed on label: Karl Ephraim WESTON [underlined]/ (1874-1956)/ Founder and first director of the / Lawrence Art Museum, 1926-1948./ Professor of the History of ARt/ 1912-1940, and first chairman of/ the department.  Awarded honorary/ degree of L.H.D. and the Rogerson Cup/ by Williams College, from which he/ graduated in 1896. Alumni Trustee/ of the college during World War II.
